list.abs: 不同物种恢复的速率不同:海鸠(murre)的数量逐步上升,而其他物种如丑鸭(Harlequin Duck)和北美黑蛎鹬(Black Oystercatcher)等则恢复缓慢。或许只有等到鲱鱼群恢复的.

entry.tran: （以有壳水生动物为食的）蛎鹬
entry.def: An oystercatcher is a black and white bird with a long red beak. It lives near the sea and eats small shellfish.

means.word_mean: 1. black-and-white shorebird with stout legs and bill; feed on oysters etc.

auth_sentence.content: Oystercatcher Oystercatchers are striking, black and white wading birds with long bright red bills.
auth_sentence.res_content: Oystercatcher Oystercatchers are striking, black and white wading birds with long bright red bills.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Oystercatcher Oystercatchers are striking, black and white wading birds with long bright red bills.

auth_sentence.content: We were alone in the great outdoors apart from a spindly-legged oystercatcher poking about in the mud.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were alone in the great outdoors apart from a spindly-legged oystercatcher poking about in the mud.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were alone in the great outdoors apart from a spindly-legged oystercatcher poking about in the mud.
